name: SKHETCH
description:
Skhetch is a 2D platformer created in Unity which is focused on jumping, and avoiding dangerous traps using only the cursor. Aim/look with the mouse, and use the left mouse button to jump. Use the platforms and walls to your advantage to reach the end of each stage.

There is no current estimate for a full release, as the game is currently in a prototyping phase. However, this playable demo is fully functional, and hopes to convey how the final product might look and play.
